/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about assigning effective dates for previously decided claims, including
considerations relevant to previously decided claims
continuously pursued claims
supplemental claims received after the prior claim has become finally adjudicated
example of effective date assigned under
38 CFR 3.2500(h)(1)
, and
38 CFR 3.2500(h)(2)
, and
effective date considerations for incomplete supplemental claims
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - Revision Based on Specific Types of Submissions, Including Supplemental Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
